bibl.title: Letter from Jennie Carroll to Howard A. Kelly, September 30, 1907

div1.p: Carroll thanks Kelly for his letter of sympathy. She will loan him a photograph of her late husband.

div1.head: Letter from Jennie Carroll to Howard A. Kelly, September 30, 1907
div1.opener:
Dr Latimer
will write to them
after hearing from
Dr Cushing
10/2/07 wrote to
all -- asked Dr's.
King & Ruffin
to speak
33 Clifton H. N. W.
Washington D.C.
Sep. 30-1907.
My dear Dr. Kelly:
div1.p:
I received your
kind letter of sympathy, from
Miss Latimer, and wish to express
my gratitude, for the interest you
are taking in my beloved husband
to present a memoir of him, at
the meeting of the Johns Hopkins
Historical Society Oct. 14.

I feel ashamed that I
have not been able to respond
sooner but I have not been
very well since the Drs. death,
it is a problem to solve the caring
of seven children, with a small
income.

I have asked the following
gentlemen, to speak at your
request, and they have kindly
consented to give me that pleasure,
with the understanding, that you
will communicate with them,
as to what you desire also any
information that I may be
able to furnish you with, or
these gentlemen, will be glad to
give it: Their names and addresses
are as follows:
Dr. A. F. A. King 1315. Mars. Ave. N.W.
Dr. Sterling Ruffin 1335 Coun. Ave. N.W.
Dr. A.S Stavely 1744 M. Street N.W.
Dr. J.O. Skinner Columbia Hospital
Dr. Harry Donnally 1018 - 14th Street N.W.
Dr. F. F. Russell Army Med. Museum
Dr. B. S. Hardin 1311. Coun. Ave. N.W.
I hope that I have not asked
too many and that everything
will be a success.

As to the pictures of
Dr. Carroll, I haven't any in
his boy-hood days, and the
latest picture I have, and greatly
prize, is one that he had taken
last Xmas with his three son's.
and if you care to have this one,.
If you will write me I will
send it to you with pleasure.

Hoping that I may
in the near future have the pleasure
AC
C to Dr
of meeting you in person, (as
I have heard Dr. Carroll speak
so often of you in such high
terms)
div1.closer:
I am
Most Sincerely, Jennie M. G. Carroll Dr. Kelly
1418 Eutaw. Place
Baltimore
Md.
FROM DR. HOWARD A. KELLY
